allow: Bash(while IFS='|' read -r addr total buys sells volume avgprice first last)

Bash(do echo "Address: $addr:0:10...$addr: -4" echo "  Total Trades: $total (Buy: $buys, Sell: $sells)" echo "  Total Volume: $volume tokens" echo "  Avg Price: $avgprice USDC" echo "  First Trade: $first" echo "  Last Trade: $last" echo "" done)
Bash(while IFS='|' read addr total buys sells)
